command.name: DELAK
command.desc: DELAK allows you to remove a previously set akick on a specified channel. This may be done by user@host or by the number provided by the ChanServ LISTAK command.

ex.pre: To remove an akick on the nick Carlton from #Dark:
To remove an akick on Carlton from #Dark by host mask:
To remove an akick from #Dark by list number:
